Bio

I am a FullStack Developer who likes to work with new technologies. I chose to web development to be my job because I love coding and learning new technologies! My main technologies are :

  • HTML /CSS3 / Javascript (ES7 and prior)
  • ReactJS / Redux / Webpack
  • Bootstrap 4 / Semantic-ui React
  • NodeJS / ExpressJS
  • MongoDB
See you soon!
